Headline: Temporary Reroute
ShortDescription: #126 Jackson buses are temporarily rerouted via Jackson, Central, Harrison, and into the terminal, due to a festival near Jackson/Central.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
How does this affect my trip?

Buses will operate in both directions via Jackson, Central, Harrison, and then into the terminal.

Allow extra travel time.

 

Why is service being changed?

Buses are rerouted due to Fiesta Boricua.

Headline: Purple Line Service Delayed at Howard
ShortDescription: Purple Line trains are standing at Howard due to track switching problems. Crews working to restore service.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
Purple Line trains are standing with delays at Howard due to track switching problems.

Shuttle buses have been requested from Howard to Linden provide additional connecting service through the affected area.

At this time, also consider other service alternatives that might serve your trip, such as nearby bus routes, or using buses to other rail lines.

Personnel are working to restore normal service. Allow extra travel time.

Headline: Red Line Delays
ShortDescription: Red Line trains are running w/residual delays following earlier track switching problems at Howard. Service is resuming, allow extra time.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
Red Line trains are running with residual delays following earlier track switching problems at Howard. 

Trains are moving and normal service is being restored.

Allow extra travel time.
